snippet: The Swiss bank's net profit rose 2.6 percent in the second quarter, as it announced a number of measures to increase capital reserves in response to concerns from Switzerland's central bank.
abstract: The Swiss bank's net profit rose 2.6 percent in the second quarter, as it announced a number of measures to increase capital reserves in response to concerns from Switzerland's central bank.

headline.main: Credit Suisse to Bolster Capital Reserves as Profit Increases
headline.print_headline: Credit Suisse to Bolster Capital Reserves as Profit Increases
